page.title: 06LOCAL POLICEMAN
page.content:
...winter,a lot of his time is spent dealing with poachers.Not only are pheasants stolen but also Christmas turkeys and chickens and even Christmas trees are not safe.
Although P.C.Holland is Balcombe's policeman,he and his colleagues have to cover Lindfield, Ardingly, Handcross,Bolney and also help out in Haywards Heath and Crawley. He has too much paperwork which takes up a lot of time. On late shift P.C.Holland finishes at around 11.00 p.m.,but this can be later at weekends. He usually gets to bed at around midnight.
His job is very dangerous.He has been shot at by poachers but luckily they missed.
